reviewText:
This video is filled with the story of one of America's most beloved country comedy stars and humorous characters. She carved her own special unique niche in show business, especially within the country music world, where she provided a lot of fun and laughs between the songs.
She was a very warm, charming, sweet, and likeable lady, who could raise anybody's spirits and make you forget your troubles for a while.
There are a lot of very touching moments in this video of Minnie and her many friends recalling her rise to fame and the highlights of her career.
